# Online supplements {.unnumbered}

This webpage contains the online supplements to:

> Le Foll, Elen. to appear/October 2024. *Textbook English: A Multi-Dimensional Approach* \[[Studies in Corpus Linguistics](https://benjamins.com/catalog/scl)\]. Amsterdam: John Benjamins.


The book is based on revised versions of selected (sub)chapters from my PhD thesis:

> Le Foll, Elen. 2022. *Textbook English: A Corpus-Based Analysis of the Language of EFL textbooks used in Secondary Schools in France, Germany and Spain*. Osnabrück, Germany: Osnabrück University. PhD thesis. <https://doi.org/10.48693/278>.
